general_care_tips.water_change: Change clean water daily, keep vase clean
general_care_tips.stem_cutting: Cut stems diagonally 1-2cm from bottom every 2-3 days
general_care_tips.temperature: Maintain room temperature 15-25°C, avoid extreme temperatures
general_care_tips.lighting: Avoid direct sunlight, choose bright indirect light environment
general_care_tips.humidity: Maintain moderate humidity, avoid excessive dryness
general_care_tips.placement: Keep away from heaters, air conditioning vents, etc.

seasonal_recommendations.spring: Suitable for light-colored flowers like white roses, daisies
seasonal_recommendations.summer: Choose heat-resistant varieties like sunflowers, calla lilies
seasonal_recommendations.winter: Evergreen plants combined with pine branches, eucalyptus
